typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerId as short,
		CustomerEstablishedDate as date,
		CustomerTypeId as short,
		PartyId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'raw',
	fileName: 'Customer.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> CustomercsvSource
CustomercsvSource sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'RetailTemplateDB',
	tableName: 'Customer',
	input(
		CustomerId as long,
		CustomerEstablishedDate as date,
		CustomerTypeId as integer,
		ResponsibilityCenterId as integer,
		LedgerId as integer,
		LedgerAccountNumber as string,
		CustomerNote as string,
		PartyId as long,
		GlobalLocationNumber as decimal(13,0)
	)) ~> CustomerSink
